kpi.name: RNC_781a
kpi.formula: ( intsysho.if_hho_w_cm_lb_prx_tot_nrt + intsysho.if_hho_w_cm_lb_ptx_tot_nrt + intsysho.if_hho_w_cm_lb_rsvr_sc_nrt + intsysho.if_hho_w_cm_lb_res_lim_nrt + intsysho.if_hho_wo_cm_lb_prx_tot_nrt + intsysho.if_hho_wo_cm_lb_ptx_tot_nrt + intsysho.if_hho_wo_cm_lb_rsvr_sc_nrt + intsysho.if_hho_wo_cm_lb_res_lim_nrt + intsysho.if_hho_w_cm_lb_capa_ul_nrt + intsysho.if_hho_w_cm_lb_capa_dl_nrt + intsysho.if_hho_wo_cm_lb_capa_ul_nrt + intsysho.if_hho_wo_cm_lb_capa_dl_nrt )

kpi_info.title: LB IFHO measurement started NRT
kpi_info.use: The KPI is incremented when due to the Load Based handover functionality either the handover control entity decides to make an inter-frequency HHO attempt (RANAP:RELOCATION REQUIRED message is sent to CN) or the handover control entity decides that no cell is good enough for handover after measuring with compressed mode.
kpi_info.formula:
sum( IF_HHO_W_CM_LB_PRX_TOT_NRT
+ IF_HHO_W_CM_LB_PTX_TOT_NRT
+ IF_HHO_W_CM_LB_RSVR_SC_NRT
+ IF_HHO_W_CM_LB_RES_LIM_NRT
+ IF_HHO_WO_CM_LB_PRX_TOT_NRT
+ IF_HHO_WO_CM_LB_PTX_TOT_NRT
+ IF_HHO_WO_CM_LB_RSVR_SC_NRT
+ IF_HHO_WO_CM_LB_RES_LIM_NRT
+ IF_HHO_W_CM_LB_CAPA_UL_NRT
+ IF_HHO_W_CM_LB_CAPA_DL_NRT
+ IF_HHO_WO_CM_LB_CAPA_UL_NRT
+ IF_HHO_WO_CM_LB_CAPA_DL_NRT
+ )
